Class-Swashbuckler 20 -- Male Versatile Human Swashbuckler: 20
Strength: +4 Dexterity: +4 Constitution: +3 Intelligence: +4 Wisdom: +4 Charisma: +4
Background: Insurgent Deity: Gozreh
Experience: 19042/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 45 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 11/16
Attribute Notes:
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 20 from any)
Fleet: +5 Speed
Hefty Hauler: +2 Encumbered Bulk/+2 Maximum Bulk
Vivacious Speed: +15 Speed/Has increased Stylish Combatant effects
Feather Step: Can Step into difficult terrain
Flamboyant Athlete: Panache gives 22' climb and swim Speeds
Nimble Crawl: Can Crawl at full Speed/Does not suffer off-guard from being prone
Stylish Combatant: +35 Speed with panache
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry: 5; Class: 12; General: 6; Skill: 28 Selectable Feature Count: Human (Heritage); Swashbuckler (Style)

Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: Ancestry Feats (Choose 5 from any)
Battledancer: Has the Fascinating Performance feature
Clever Improviser: Has the Untrained Improvisation feature
General Feats: General Feats (Choose 5 from any)
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Multitalented: Class Feat (Choose 1 from any Multiclass)
Plummeting Roll: Has the Cat Fall feature
Rascal: Has the Dirty Trick feature
Skill Feats: Skill Feats (Choose 10 from any)
Stylish Tricks (Battledancer): Skill Feat (Choose 3 from any Acrobatics, any Performance)
Stylish Tricks (Braggart): Skill Feat (Choose 3 from any Acrobatics, any Intimidation)
Stylish Tricks (Fencer): Skill Feat (Choose 3 from any Acrobatics, any Deception)
Stylish Tricks (Gymnast): Skill Feat (Choose 3 from any Acrobatics, any Athletics)
Stylish Tricks (Rascal): Skill Feat (Choose 3 from any Acrobatics, any Thievery)
Stylish Tricks (Wit): Skill Feat (Choose 3 from any Acrobatics, any Diplomacy)
Swashbuckler Feats: Class Feats (Choose 11 from any)
Swashbuckler's Style: 1 selection
Versatile Human: General Feat (Choose 1 from any)
Wit: Has the Bon Mot feature
Perception: +30 (wisdom; master)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +32 (dexterity; legendary) Kobold Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Society: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Arcana: +28 (intelligence; expert) Medicine: +26 (wisdom; trained) Stealth: +26 (dexterity; trained)
Athletics: +32 (strength; legendary) Nature: +26 (wisdom; trained) Survival: +26 (wisdom; trained)
Crafting: +28 (intelligence; expert) Occultism: +24 (intelligence; untrained) Thievery: +32 (dexterity; legendary)
Deception: +30 (charisma; master) Performance: +30 (charisma; master) Warfare Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Diplomacy: +32 (charisma; legendary) Religion: +24 (wisdom; untrained)
Intimidation: +32 (charisma; legendary) Scouting Lore: +32 (intelligence; legendary)
Languages: Common; Diabolic; Fey; Petran; Sakvroth; Sussuran
Skill Notes:
Additional Lore (Scouting Lore): Skill Legendary (Scouting Lore)
Battledancer: Skill Trained (Performance)
Braggart: Skill Trained (Intimidation)
Duplicated Training: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from any)
Fencer: Skill Trained (Deception)
Gymnast: Skill Trained (Athletics)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +4 Language Count
Perception Mastery: Perception Master
Rascal: Skill Trained (Thievery)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 27 from any)
Skill Training (Kobold Lore): Skill Trained (Kobold Lore)
Stylish Tricks (Battledancer): +3 Skill Increase (Acrobatics or Performance)
Stylish Tricks (Braggart): +3 Skill Increase (Acrobatics or Intimidation)
Stylish Tricks (Fencer): +3 Skill Increase (Acrobatics or Deception)
Stylish Tricks (Gymnast): +3 Skill Increase (Acrobatics or Athletics)
Stylish Tricks (Rascal): +3 Skill Increase (Acrobatics or Thievery)
Stylish Tricks (Wit): +3 Skill Increase (Acrobatics or Diplomacy)
Swashbuckler Expertise: Has increased Stylish Combatant effects
Swashbuckler Skills: Skill Trained (Acrobatics; Select 8 from any)
Untrained Improvisation: +20 on untrained skill checks
Wit: Skill Trained (Diplomacy)
Battledancer: Perform actions have the bravado trait
Charming Liar: Critical success on a Lie improves a target's attitude by 1 step once per conversation
Clever Improviser: Can attempt any skill untrained
Combat Climber: Can Climb with a hand occupied, can fight while Climbing, and Climbing does not inflict off-guard
Continuous Flair: Stylish Combatant bonus applies during exploration
Cooperative Soul: Failures and critical failures to Aid with expert skills are successes
Experienced Professional: Critical failures when using Lore to Earn Income are normal failures, and normal failures give twice the normal income
Experienced Tracker: Can Track at full Speed, suffering a -5 Survival penalty
Fascinating Performance: Can fascinate 10 targets for 1 rd with a successful Performance vs. Will
Flamboyant Athlete: Panache gives -10 jump DCs, and 5' and 20' vertical and horizontal Leaps
Focused Fascination: Fascinating Performance used with a single target fascinates on a normal success
Forager: Failures and critical failures on Survival to Subsist are successes/Subsist successes provide for self and 4 others, or twice that number with a critical success
Group Coercion: Can use Intimidation to Coerce 50 targets
Group Impression: Can use Diplomacy to Make An Impression on 100 targets
Hobnobber: Can Gather Information in half the normal time, and critical failures when taking the normal time are normal failures
Impressive Performance: Can use Performance to Make An Impression
Lengthy Diversion: Can remain hidden after a Create A Diversion attempt critically succeeds
Natural Medicine: Can use Nature to Treat Wounds; gives a +2 bonus in wilderness
One For All: (1) Prepares to Aid an ally within 30'; the subsequent Aid can use Diplomacy for the check and has the bravado trait
Pickpocket: Can attempt to Steal a closely-guarded object without penalty/Can use 2 actions to attempt to Steal with a -5 penalty from an alert creature
Powerful Leap: Can make 5' vertical and +5' horizontal jumps
Quick Identification: Can Identify Magic in 1 min
Quick Jump: Can use High Jump and Long Jump as 1 action without an initial Stride
Quick Repair: Can Repair an item in 1 min
Rascal: Dirty Trick actions have the bravado trait
Ride: Automatically succeeds when using Command An Animal to move/Mount acts on self turn
Sign Language: Knows the sign equivalents of understood languages
Specialty Crafting: +1 Crafting on a selected type of item
Stylish Combatant: Gains +2 on bravado skill checks during combat
Subtle Theft: Successful Steal inflicts -2 Perception on observers to detect/Remains undetected when using Palm An Object or Steal after a successful Create A Diversion
Supertaster: Automatically attempts to identify ingredients, including poisons, in consumed items, and tasting gives +2 to a relevant Recall Knowledge check
Survey Wildlife: Can use Survival with a -2 penalty to Recall Knowledge about local creatures after 10 min of study
Trick Magic Item: (1) Successful check on the related skill activates a magic item until the end of the turn
Virtuosic Performer: +2 checks on a chosen Performance type
Wit: Bon Mot actions have the bravado trait
Combat
Hit Points: 268 Armor Class: 41 (dexterity (3 max); master) Class DC: Swashbuckler: 40 (dexterity; master)
Armor: Chain Shirt Shield: None Weapons: Dart (+30 1d4+4 P R20'; dexterity; master); Greatsword (+30 1d12+4 S/P; strength; master); Shortbow (+30 1d6 P [Crit +d10] R60'; dexterity; master)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +60
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Eternal Confidence: Class Master (Swashbuckler)
Greater Weapon Specialization: Has increased Weapon Specialization effects
Light Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Light Armor Mastery: Defense Master (Light Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Precise Finisher: Has increased Confident Finisher effects
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Swashbuckler Expertise: Class Expert (Swashbuckler)
Unconventional Weaponry (Greataxe): Weapon Familiarity (Greataxe)
Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Weapon Mastery: Attack Master (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Weapon Proficiency (Capturing Spetum): Attack Expert (Capturing Spetum)
After You: (F) Gains panache during initiative by taking the last position in the initiative order
Agile Maneuvers: Reduces the multiple attack penalty for Disarm, Grapple, Reposition, Shove, and Trip to -4 and -8, or -3 and -6 for an agile weapon with panache
Antagonize: Successful Demoralize prevents the target from removing its frightened condition until it attacks self or moves out of sight for 1 rd
Bleeding Finisher: (1) Slashing or piercing attack also inflicts persistent bleed damage equal to Precise Strike damage
Bon Mot: R30' Successful Diplomacy vs. Will inflicts -2 Perception and Will, or -3 on a critical success, for 1 min; critical failure inflicts the same on self for 1 min or until a successful Bon Mot
Braggart: Demoralize actions have the bravado trait
Brandishing Draw: (1) Draws a weapon and uses it for a Strike or a 1-action finisher
Buckler Dance: (1) Constantly has buckler raised
Combination Finisher: Reduces the multiple attack penalty for finisher Strikes to -4 and -8, or -3 and -6 for an agile weapon
Confident Finisher: (1) Strike with an agile or finesse weapon inflicts full Precise Strike precision damage on failure
Dastardly Dash: (1) Strides up to 22'; can attempt 1 Trip or Dirty Trick during the move
Deadly Grace: Critical hits with agile and finesse melee weapons gain the deadly d8 trait or inflict double the normal damage dice if wielding a weapon that already has the deadly trait
Derring-Do: With panache, can use the better of 2 rolls on bravado actions
Dirty Trick: Successful Thievery vs. Reflex inflicts clumsy 1 for 1 rd, or until the target performs an Interact action on a critical success; critical failure inflicts prone on self
Disarming Flair: Disarm action has the bravado trait
Distracting Toss: (2) Attempts a Feint and a thrown weapon Strike vs. a target within 30'
Dual Finisher: (1) Uses a weapon in each hand to make 1 attack each at the current multiple attack penalty against 2 different foes
Elegant Buckler: Raise A Shield with a buckler gives +2 Armor Class, and a foe critical miss while a buckler is raised gives panache until the end of the next turn
Enjoy The Show: R30' Successful single-target Perform can instead inflict -1 attacks against creatures others than self, or -2 on a critical success, until the end of the target's next turn; critical failure instead gives the target +1 attacks against self until the end of its next turn
Eternal Confidence: Finisher and Opportune Riposte Strikes with agile and finesse weapons gain the Confident Finisher failure effect
Even The Odds: (F) Gains panache at the beginning of the turn when flanked once per 10 min
Exemplary Finisher (Battledancer): Successful finisher Strike allows a free Step afterward
Exemplary Finisher (Braggart): Successful finisher Strike ends any temporary immunity the target has to Demoralize attempts by self
Exemplary Finisher (Fencer): Successful finisher Strike inflicts off-guard until the start of the next turn
Exemplary Finisher (Gymnast): Successful finisher Strike on a grabbed, restrained, or prone target inflicts additional damage equal to double the number of damage dice
Exemplary Finisher (Rascal): Successful finisher Strike inflicts -10 Speed until the start of the next turn
Exemplary Finisher (Wit): Successful finisher Strike inflicts -2 attacks on self until the start of the next turn
Extravagant Parry: (1) Gives +1 Armor Class when wielding a one-handed weapon, or +2 with a free hand or a parry weapon, until the start of the next turn; a foe miss during this time gives panache until the end of the next turn
Felicitous Riposte: Opportune Riposte uses the better of 2 attack rolls
Fencer: Create A Distraction and Feint actions have the bravado trait
Finishing Follow-Through: Gains panache whenever a finisher brings the target to 0 Hit Points
Flamboyant Leap: (2) Attempts a 1-action finisher during a Leap or Jump of up to 90', then falls
Flashy Dodge: (R) Gives +2 Armor Class vs. the triggering attack; a miss gives panache until the end of the next turn
Flying Blade: Can apply Precise Strike damage bonuses when using agile or finesse thrown weapons within their first range increment
Get Used To Disappointment: (F) (Bravado) At the beginning of a turn, attempts to Demoralize a target within 30' who failed an attack or skill check vs. self once per target per min
Goading Feint: Successful Feint can instead inflict -2 to the target's next attack vs. self before the end of the its next turn, or to all of its attacks vs. self on a critical success
Guardian's Deflection: (R) When wielding a one-handed weapon with the other hand free, gives an ally within reach +2 Armor Class vs. the triggering attack and gives self panache until the end of the next turn
Gymnast: Grapple, Reposition, Shove, and Trip actions have the bravado trait
Illimitable Finisher: (1) Steps and attempts a 1-action finisher Strike as a bravado action; regaining panache allows immediately using another finisher
Impaling Finisher: (1) Makes a bludgeoning or piercing melee Strike against an adjacent foe and another one behind it
Impossible Riposte: Can use Opportune Riposte against ranged attacks, with the subsequent Strike inflicting the same damage type as the attack
Inexhaustible Countermoves: Gains a reaction at the start of each foe turn that can be used to make an Opportune Riposte
Keen Flair: Strikes with a master proficiency weapon critically succeed on a 19
Leading Dance: (1) (Bravado) Successful Performance vs. Will moves self and an adjacent foe 5' in the same direction, or 10' on a critical success; critical failure inflicts prone on self
Lethal Finisher: (1) Strike inflicts 12d6 HP precision (save Fortitude inflicts 6d6 HP; critical success inflicts 6 HP; critical failure inflicts 18d6 HP) instead of Precise Strike damage
Mobile Finisher: (1) Makes a Strike after a Stride
Opportune Riposte: (R) (Bravado) Strikes or attempts to Disarm the attacker in response to the triggering critical miss
Panache Paragon: Permanently quickened; can use the extra action only to perform a bravado action
Panache: Tumble Through and other bravado actions give panache that enables finisher actions
Parry And Riposte: While benefitting from Extravagant Parry or a parry weapon Armor Class bonus, can use Opportune Riposte after a normal failure on a foe Strike if the foe was damaged by a finisher on the prior turn
Perfect Finisher: (1) Strike uses the better of 2 rolls
Precise Strike: Strikes with agile and finesse weapons inflict +6 HP precision, or +6d6 HP precision with finisher Strikes
Reflexive Riposte: Can use an additional reaction for Opportune Riposte each turn
Retreating Finisher: (1) Strike allows a free Step on failure
Revitalizing Finisher: (1) Successful strike gives self and allies within 30' 10 temporary Hit Points; failure gives them only to self
Stumbling Finisher: (1) Successful Strike pushes the target 5', or 10' on a critical hit
Stunning Finisher: (1) Successful melee Strike inflicts stunned 1 (save Fortitude prevents target reactions until its next turn; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stunned 3)
Swaggering Initiative: (F) Gives +2 initiative and allows drawing a weapon; acting first in combat gives panache
Switcheroo: (R) With panache, Repositions an adjacent foe so that it suffers the triggering ranged attack with lesser cover, or with no cover on a critical success; critical failure inflicts off-guard on self against the attack, and any result other than critical success causes loss of panache
Targeting Finisher: (1) Successful targeted attack on a foe's arm, head, or legs inflicts enfeebled 2, stupefied 2, or -10 Speed until the end of the next turn; the effect extends for 1 min at half severity on a critical hit
The Bigger They Are: (1) (Bravado) Successful Tumble Through a larger creature's space as difficult terrain inflicts weakness 10 to precision damage from the next self attack until the end of the turn, or against all self attacks on a critical success; failure ends movement, triggering reactions, and critical failure inflicts prone on self
Titan Wrestler: Can use Disarm, Grapple, Shove, and Trip on creatures up to 3 sizes larger
Tumble Behind: Successful Tumble Through inflicts off-guard against the next self attack until the end of the turn
Twirling Throw: (1) Thrown weapon attack ignores 2nd and 3rd range increment penalties, and the weapon returns except on a critical failure
Unbalancing Finisher: (1) Successful Strike inflicts off-guard until the end of the next turn
Vexing Tumble: (1) (Bravado) Successful Acrobatics vs. each foe's Reflex while Striding up to 22' does not trigger reactions; critical success also inflicts off-guard vs. self until the end of the turn, and critical failure ends the move within the foe's reach
Vivacious Bravado: (1) Gains 24 temporary Hit Points until the start of the next turn after gaining panache
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +4, +6, or +8 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
You're Next: (F) After downing a foe, makes a +2 Intimidation check to Demoralize another within 60'
Save: Fortitude: +29 (constitution; master); Reflex: +32 (dexterity; legendary); Will: +30 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Assured Evasion: Save Legendary (Reflex)
Canny Acumen (Fortitude): Save Master (Fortitude)
Confident Evasion: Save Master (Reflex)
Fortitude Expertise: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Reinforced Ego: Save Master (Will)
Assured Evasion: Critical failures on Reflex saves are normal failures, and failed Reflex saves inflict half damage
Cat Fall: Suffers no damage from falling
Charmed Life: (R) Gives +2 on the triggering save, and success gives panache until the end of the next turn
Cheat Death: (R) Retains 1 Hit Point, gains panache, and gains 1 level of doomed for 10 min in response to the triggering damage that would reduce self to 0 Hit Points
Confident Evasion: Successes on Reflex saves are critical successes
Flashy Roll: Flashy Dodge can also be used with Reflex saves; failure on the attack or success on the save allows a 10' Stride
Incredible Luck: Charmed life uses the better of 2 rolls
Plummeting Roll: (R) Strides up to 22' after the triggering fall of at least 10' that inflicts no damage
Reinforced Ego: Successes on Will save are critical successes
Magic
Magic Notes: Heroic Presence: (1) R30' Generates the effects of a 6th-rank Zealous Conviction on 10 willing creatures once per day
Notes
Validation Errors:
Class Feats Allocation: 12 available vs. 59 allocated
Swashbuckler Style Allocation: 1 available vs. 6 allocated
